verbose_text: CX3CR1 expressing macrophages are thought to be involved in the spread of MCMV; however, because differences were not observed in the conventional memory (M45- and I8V-tetramer +) populations, which act as an internal control (XREF_FIG A-4F; XREF_SUPPLEMENTARY), viral spread in Cx3cr1 gfp +/gfp+ mice is likely to be preserved.
